headline: Rite Aid’s Thrifty ice cream brand gets sold to a business entity linked to Monster Energy executives
summary: The beloved brand, whose fate has been uncertain in the wake of Rite Aid’s bankruptcy, might be scooped up as part of a proposed $19 million purchase.
